description: A female progeny with genetic makeup inherited from the parent.
A male progeny with genetic makeup inherited from the parent.
A male relative who is the biological father of the biological mother.
A male relative who is the biological father of the biological father.
A female relative who is the biological mother of the biological father.
A female relative who is the biological mother of the biological mother.
A relative who is the offspring of a sibling of the biological mother and thus sharing a common ancestor.
A relative who is the offspring of a sibling of the biological father and thus sharing a common ancestor.
A female relative who is a sibling of the biological father, and who both share a common ancestor.
A female relative who is a sibling of the biological mother, and who both share a common ancestor.
A male who contributes to the genetic makeup of his offspring through the fertilization of an ovum by his sperm.
A female who contributes to the genetic makeup of her offspring from the fertilization of her ovum.

value: Half-brother with Father as Common Parent
description: A male sibling who shares the genetic makeup inherited from only the biological father.

value: Half-sister with Father as Common Parent
description: A female sibling who shares the genetic makeup inherited from only the biological father.

value: Half-brother with Mother as Common Parent
description: A male sibling who shares the genetic makeup inherited from only the biological mother.

description: A female sibling who shares the genetic makeup inherited from only the biological mother.

A female full sibling that developed from a shared ovum.
A male who shares with his sibling the genetic makeup inherited from both of the biological parents.
A female who shares with her sibling the genetic makeup inherited from both of the biological parents.
A male grandchild.
A female grandchild.

A male relative who is a sibling of the biological father, and who both share a common ancestor.

A son of your brother or sister.
Someone from whom you are descended (but usually more remote than a grandparent).

A child of one's first cousin who is related by lineage through the father's side of the family.
Someone deriving or descending from an ancestor.
A child of one's grandchild.
A parent of one's maternal grandparent.
A parent of one's paternal grandparent.

A female child of one's niece or nephew.

The uncle of one's father.

The specific quantity is not known, but is known to be non-zero and is not specified because it makes up the bulk of the material. e.g. 'Add 10mg of ingredient X, 50mg of ingredient Y, and sufficient quantity of water to 100mL.' The null flavor would be used to express the quantity of water.
The content is greater than zero, but too small to be quantified.
